UNSUPPORTED_HTTP_VERB.message: Only requests with GET or POST methods are allowed.

NO_BODY.message: Missing or empty body found but body expected.

NO_PATH.message: URL path does not match any image path/name artefact.

ARTEFACT_NOT_FOUND.message: Specified artefact was not found in file tree.

UNAUTHORIZED.message: No or invalid API key found in authorization header.
